verses.verse: O Yisra'EL <WH3478>, return <WH7725> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>; for thou hast fallen <WH3782> <WH8804> by thine iniquity <WH5771>.

Take <WH3947> <WH8798> with you words <WH1697>, and turn <WH7725> <WH8798> to the YY <WH3068>: say <WH559> <WH8798> unto him, Take away <WH5375> <WH8799> all iniquity <WH5771>, and receive <WH3947> <WH8798> us graciously <WH2896>: so will we render <WH7999> <WH8762> the calves <WH6499> of our lips <WH8193>.

Asshur <WH804> shall not save <WH3467> <WH8686> us; we will not ride <WH7392> <WH8799> upon horses <WH5483>: neither will we say <WH559> <WH8799> any more to the work <WH4639> of our hands <WH3027>, Ye are our 'elohim <WH430>: for in thee the fatherless <WH3490> findeth mercy <WH7355> <WH8792>.
I will heal <WH7495> <WH8799> their backsliding <WH4878>, I will love <WH157> <WH8799> them freely <WH5071>: for mine anger <WH639> is turned away <WH7725> <WH8804> from him.
I will be as the dew <WH2919> unto Yisra'EL <WH3478>: he shall grow <WH6524> <WH8799> as the lily <WH7799>, and cast forth <WH5221> <WH8686> his roots <WH8328> as Lebanon <WH3844>.
His branches <WH3127> shall spread <WH3212> <WH8799>, and his beauty <WH1935> shall be as the olive tree <WH2132>, and his smell <WH7381> as Lebanon <WH3844>.

They that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> under his shadow <WH6738> shall return <WH7725> <WH8799>; they shall revive <WH2421> <WH8762> as the corn <WH1715>, and grow <WH6524> <WH8799> as the vine <WH1612>: the scent <WH2143> thereof shall be as the wine <WH3196> of Lebanon <WH3844>.

Efrayim <WH669> shall say, What have I to do any more with idols <WH6091>? I have heard <WH6030> <WH8804> him, and observed <WH7789> <WH8799> him: I am like a green <WH7488> fir tree <WH1265>. From me is thy fruit <WH6529> found <WH4672> <WH8738>.

Who is wise <WH2450>, and he shall understand <WH995> <WH8799> these things? prudent <WH995> <WH8737>, and he shall know <WH3045> <WH8799> them? for the ways <WH1870> of the YY <WH3068> are right <WH3477>, and the just <WH6662> shall walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in them: but the transgressors <WH6586> <WH8802> shall fall <WH3782> <WH8735> therein.
